subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: A lackluster Manchester United required a fortuitous penalty converted by Robin van Persie and a late free kick by Wayne Rooney to overcome 10-man Crystal Palace, 2-0, in England’s Premier League.
snippet: A lackluster Manchester United required a fortuitous penalty converted by Robin van Persie and a late free kick by Wayne Rooney to overcome 10-man Crystal Palace, 2-0, in England’s Premier League.
